title: Subway Might Soon Be Legally Required to Measure Your Footlong
text:
Subway Might Soon Be Legally Required to Measure Your Footlong 
Published By: Gawker.com - Today 
There’s an old joke that goes something like: “Boy, the food at this place is really terrible,” says one Subway customer to another. �...
